creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture; formerly given to the Center by Audrey Seo and Stephen Addiss
description: four lines of delicate, neatly spaced calligraphy on a square sheet; fifth smaller, shorter line at far L rectangular intaglio stamp URC; two-part, rectangular stamp with rounded edges LLC
markings: URC, red intaglio stamp; LLC, red relief stamp; on back, ULC, in pencil: [Chosai]; on back, in center, in pencil, Japanese inscription
title: Poetic Quatrain
